link.script: /* CSS Browser Selector v0.4.0 (Nov 02, 2010) Can apply styles to specific browsers, this js adds a class to body tag based on browser Rafael Lima (http://rafael.adm.br) http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ Contributors: http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector#contributors */ function css_browser_selector(u) { var ua = u.toLowerCase(), is = function (t) { return ua.indexOf(t) > -1 }, g = 'gecko', w = 'webkit', s = 'safari', o = 'opera', m = 'mobile', h = document.documentElement, b = [(!(/opera|webtv/i.test(ua)) && /msie\s(\d)/.test(ua)) ? ('ie ie' + RegExp.$1) : is('firefox/2') ? g + ' ff2' : is('firefox/3.5') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_5' : is('firefox/3.6') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_6' : is('firefox/3') ? g + ' ff3' : is('gecko/') ? g : is('opera') ? o + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$1 : (/opera(\s|\/)(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$2 : '')) : is('konqueror') ? 'konqueror' : is('blackberry') ? m + ' blackberry' : is('android') ? m + ' android' : is('chrome') ? w + ' chrome' : is('iron') ? w + ' iron' : is('applewebkit/') ? w + ' ' + s + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + s + RegExp.$1 : '') : is('mozilla/') ? g : '', is('j2me') ? m + ' j2me' : is('iphone') ? m + ' iphone' : is('ipod') ? m + ' ipod' : is('ipad') ? m + ' ipad' : is('mac') ? 'mac' : is('darwin') ? 'mac' : is('webtv') ? 'webtv' : is('win') ? 'win' + (is('windows nt 6.0') ? ' vista' : '') : is('freebsd') ? 'freebsd' : (is('x11') || is('linux')) ? 'linux' : '', 'js']; c = b.join(' '); h.className += ' ' + c; return c; }; css_browser_selector(navigator.userAgent);

var gaJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://ssl." : "http://www."); document.write(unescape("%3Cscript src='" + gaJsHost + "google-analytics.com/ga.js' type='text/javascript'%3E%3C/script%3E"));

form.name: form1

li.a: Assistant Superintendent for Curriculum and Instruction

span.style: color: #1c1e21; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

span.span: Kindergarten Screening, scheduled for April 13-16, has been postponed. We will be in contact with parents once school resumes. Looking forward to meeting our new Bulldogs .... someday!

div.a: Meal Form for those students interested in bagged lunches

div.span: If you are interested in signing up for bagged lunches offered through our cafeteria, please complete this form. This will be a weekly sign up. Packages are for DCS children under the age of 18
and this week will consist of five lunches per child.

span.div: Below is the sign up beginning on Friday, April 17th, 2020 - Tuesday, April 21st 2020 for a pick up on Wednesday, April 22nd, 2020. NOTE: the sign up closes Tuesday at 12:00 noon.

div.a: INFO ON SENIOR ATHLETE/HALL OF FAME BANQUET

br.span: Due to the current pandemic and closing of schools....the 2020 Defiance Senior Athlete/Hall of Fame Banquet scheduled for April 25th, 2020 is cancelled. This year's Hall of Fame Induction will be moved to next spring, Saturday, May 1st, 2021 at 6:30 p.m. at Defiance High School. 2020 SENIOR AWARDS will be announced at a later date.
Due to the governor's latest orders, we are now postponing Prom. No reschedule date has been set. We will explore options as we move through the coronavirus crisis.

span.div: Parents: Please see the Parent Resources (Home, Parent Resources tab on left side) on this website for information regarding resources available during our three week mandated school closure.
Students: Please see the Student Resources (Home, Student Resources tab on left side) on this website for information regarding resources available during our three week mandated school closure.

br.span: Please click on the title to read a letter from Mr. Morton regarding the school closing.
To view information from Mr. Morton regarding Coronavirus (COVID-19), please click on the above title.

a.title: Location: DHS Gym/Commons Starting at: 6:30 PM
Location: Community Room Starting at: 7:00 PM
